posts.name: Otha Suarez
posts.post: Today was a very special day. Celebrating Christmas with family and friends! Here is a picture of me admiring this amazing gift from my daughter.

comments.name: Velma Martinez
comments.comment: That looks wonderful! Have a very Merry Christmas and Happy New Year from the Martinez!

posts.name: Timothy Buck
posts.post: Hello family and friends, I would like to remind all of you why we celebrate Christmas. Christmas is celebrated to remember the birth of Jesus Christ, who Christians believe is the Son of God. The name 'Christmas' comes from the Mass of Christ (or Jesus). A Mass service (which is sometimes called Communion or Eucharist) is where Christians remember that Jesus died for us and then came back to life. Merry Christmas to you all!

comments.name: Wendell Floyd
comments.comment: Good on you, buddy! Merry Christmas to you too!

comments.name: Angela Li
comments.comment: Spot on! People tend to forget the reason for the season haha

posts.name: Darrick Smith
posts.post: As the year comes close to another yet quick ending, I just wanna give a big big shout-out to my family and friends for being with me during this rough year.
